name: BroselowLutenScale
title: Broselow Luten Scale
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains estimated patient weight values that are obtained using the Broselow Luten Scaleand used to make decisions in providing care, specifically for prescribing weight-based medications. This value set is particularly applicable to EMS professionals.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a documented weight estimation using a Broselow Luten Scale during their encounter. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Assessment category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Measurements and estimations of body weight.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
